ygData.subject: Re: Prexus Server
ygData.msgSnippet: I created a necro already, dark elven too ) Hes level 3 now but i hope i can get him to 4 b4 tomorrow ) Name is same, Leshrec. Gives easier time recognising
ygData.messageBody:
I created a necro already, dark elven too ) Hes level 3 now but i hope i can
get him to 4 b4 tomorrow ) Name is same, Leshrec. Gives easier time
recognising for everyone.
Laters
Leshrec
p.s. Whats your ICQ uin zil?
-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 4:01 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Prexus Server


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>LOL, me already there with a gnomish necromancer too, let make an evil dark
>twins, hehe. So coincident, we always select the same race and class,
>great minds think alike? LOL. I guess I better change char liao this time
>(thou I always fancy the Life Tap spells of necro), so that we can pair up
>to hunt. How abt a TSK? More evil than u leh. Hehe, since u wanna play
>evil, play dark-evil necro lor, ;) We can meet and tag team (tank and
>caster) to destroy all light in Prexus server!
>
>Regarding the XP thing, not sure if new EQ server gain xp faster, but it's
>very true for UO new server. In mature server it takes months to make a GM
>smith but in new server it only take a week or two. I guess it's not a bad
>time for us to try it out, esp our chars are all pretty young in Innoruuk.
> No harm trying too, say spend few days to a week there. Maybe we all gain
>much higher lvl in new server as compare to few weeks play in Innoruuk ;)
>
>I think DE Necro and TSK will make a great EVIL team. One more shaman
>(healer/buffer) will be nice for a evil party, whahahahahahah!
>
>Btw Les, Gandalf is more for good char. Not so suitable for evil char leh.
>
>On Tuesday, June 08, 1999 3:40 PM, Leshrec [SMTP:leshrec@...]
>wrote:
>> As you guys might have known, the new server Prexus is up already. Being
>a wizard, I have always wanted to play the dark side and have always been
>fascinated by the necromancer's array of spells. Therefore i have decided
>to make a Gnomish Necromancer in the Prexus server and see how it goes.
>Being a new server, less people would probably be there, and thus the
>initial xp gain should be speedy enough. Anyone who is willing to switch
>servers for a while to try out the class they always wanted, but not able
>to bear to leave their main characters can always join me. )
>> My nick there would probably be Gandalf but if server does not allow it,
>then Khadgar or Leshrac. Laters!
>>
>> Leshrec
>> << File: ATT00001.htm >>
